result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tom Allen Pethke

ADDRESS INFO for Tom Allen Pethke
Current: 1000 County Road MP, Negaunee, MI 49866   (Effective: 04-27-2022)
Prior: 1000 County Road MP, Nagaunee, MI 49866 
Per bond signed by DE.  gll

Status conference on June 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Settlement conference on July 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Justin Michels.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

02:26 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Michael Joseph Becker and Intern Connor Smith,  DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius and Kaitlin Dippolito for today,  DF:  Tom Allen Pethke appeared. DE does not qualify for public defender, PFAC given. DE intends to retain private counsel. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. Intern Dippolito motions court to strike Cts 2 and 4. State requests bond. Court sets bond. Court sets STC for attorney status. Adjourned: 2:33 PM. kma  Status conference scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 10:30 am.  Settlement conference scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Filed by DA's Office. km
